meanings.definition: Resembling a berry in shape or color.
meanings.sent1: The small, round fruit was berrylike in appearance.
meanings.sent2: The red fruit had a berrylike shape and size.
meanings.sent3: The berrylike fruit rolled off the table and onto the floor.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks turned a berrylike shade of red when she blushed.
meanings.sent5: The berrylike plant stood out among the green leaves.

meanings.definition: Having qualities or characteristics similar to those of a berry.
meanings.sent1: The sweet taste of the dessert was berrylike.
meanings.sent2: The fragrance of the candle was berrylike and pleasant.
meanings.sent3: The berrylike scent filled the room, making everyone hungry.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was as light and refreshing as a berrylike breeze.
meanings.sent5: The fabric had a soft, berrylike texture that was soothing to the touch.
